divs: Sighting Details was hanging out in the back yard with 6 people and all of a sudden looked up to see a bright light that then changed in to three bright fire balls looking things ,that spun around looked as if they where playing , after a short while of staring they stopped all got togther and then one by one started flying up in to the blackness of the sky and everyone was saying thats not normal thats a ufo and i belive it had to be it was not anything i have seen before.
Summary: 3 orange bright lights kinda like a fire ball
trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
There was one other sighting in Huntington Beach on or around July 14th 2012
